lines.line: I seek a hero to go on an important mission!
I am a mighty hero!
I require the Staff of Armadyl. But if you wish to seek it for me, you must free up some inventory space so that I can give you what you need.
I require the Staff of Armadyl. It is in the deserted Temple of Ikov, near Hemenster, north east of here.
Take care hero! There is a dangerous monster somewhere in the temple!
Why can't you get it yourself?
The guardians of the Staff of Armadyl fear me!
They have set up a magical barrier which even my power cannot overcome!
That sounds like a laugh!
It's not as easy as it sounds. The monster can only be killed with a weapon of ice. There are many other dangers.
I'm up for it!
I shall give you a pendant. Without it you will not be able to enter the Chamber of Fear.
Here is my pendant. Now, I cannot stay here much longer. Meet me in my house, across the river south-east from Edgeville. It is next to the so-called Grand Exchange.
I'll pass this time.
Hmph.
What's the reward?
I see you are the mercenary type.
It's a living.
I will reward you well if you bring me the staff.
Oh no! Sounds far too dangerous!
Wimp! Call yourself a hero?! My daughter is more of a hero than you!
I told you not to meet me here again! Soon I will go to my house, across the river south-east from Edgeville. It is next to the so-called Grand Exchange.
I've lost the pendant you gave me.
Imbecile!
Sorry! Can you remind me of my mission?
My patience grows thin hero!
I need the Staff of Armadyl. It's in the Temple of Ikov, near Hemenster, north east of here.
Who dares to enter the Temple of Ikov!
A mighty hero!
Pathetic fool! Prepare to die!
A humble pilgrim.
I haven't seen a pilgrim for thousands of years!
Temple is closed!
Your puny weapons do nothing against me human! Come back when you can give me a real fight!
Hehe! We see you're in a pickle!
Wants to be getting over the nasty lava do we?
Nah, not bothered!
Hehe! Ye'll come back! They always come back!
Yes we do!
Mocking us are we? Clever one aren't we?
I'm knowing some magic trickesses! I could get over easy as that!
Don't tell them! They always come! They pester poor Winelda!
If you're such a great witch, get me over!
See! They pester Winelda!
I can do something for you!
Good! Don't pester! Help!
Get Winelda 20 limpwurt roots for my pot.
Then we shows them some magic!
Yes I do!
Have you got roots for poor Winelda?
How many did you need again?
We needs 20 Limpwurt roots for pot.
I've got some limpwurt roots!
We needs 20 rooteses!
I've got you the limpwurt roots!
Good! Good! My potion is nearly ready! Bubble, bubble, toil and trouble!
Now we shows them ours magic! Hold on tight!
Hi again. Could you do the honours again please?
Certainly! We helps those that helps poor Winelda!
Thou is a foul agent of Lucien! Such an agent must die!
Thou hast ventured deep into the tunnels, you have reached the temple of our master. It is many ages since a pilgrim has come here.
I seek the Staff of Armadyl.
We are the guardians of the staff, our fathers were guardians and our fathers' fathers before that. Why dost thou seek it?
Lucien will give me a grand reward for it!
Thou art working for that spawn of evil?! Fool! You must be cleansed to save your soul!
How dare you call me a fool! I will work for whom I want!
We must cleanse the temple!
I just thought of something I must do!
An agent of evil cannot be allowed to leave!
You're right, it's time for my yearly bath.
You have been cleansed!
Lucien must not get hold of the staff! He would become too powerful!
Hast thou come across the undead necromancer? It was he that raised an army of the undead against Varrock a generation ago. If you know where he is you can help us defeat him.
Ok! I'll help!
So he is close by?
Yes!
He must be gaining in power again. If you can defeat him he will be banished from this plane for a while. You will need this pendant to attack him.
No! I shall not turn against my employer!
Fool! You will die for your sins!
I need time to think.
Linger a while and be at peace.
Give it to me!
The staff is sacred! You will not have it!
I collect rare and powerful artefacts.
Your worldly greed has darkened your soul!
Out of my way fool!
I may be a fool but I will not step aside!
Why not?!
Only members of our order are allowed to handle the staff.
Then you must die!
You're right, I will go now.
That is a wise decision. Stay a while and let your soul be cleansed!
What are your kind and what are you doing here?
We are the Guardians of Armadyl. We have kept the temple safe for many ages. The evil in the dungeons seek what lies here. The Mahjarrat are the worst.
What is the Armadyl?
Armadyl is the god we serve. We have been charged with guarding his sacred arctifacts until he requires them.
Ah ok, thanks.
Go in peace.
Someone told me there were only three gods. Saradomin, Zamorak and Guthix.
Saradominists. Bleh. They only acknowledge those three. There are at least twenty gods!
Who are the Mahjarrat?
They are ancient and powerful beings! They are very evil! It is said that they once dominated this plane of existence, Zamorak was supposedly of their blood. They are far fewer in number now.
Some still have presence in this world in their liche forms. Mahjarrat such as Lucien and Azzanadra would become very powerful if they came into possession of the Staff of Armadyl.
Did you say Lucien? It was Lucien that asked me to get the staff!
You are a fool to be working for Lucien! Your soul must be cleansed to save you!
I hope you're doing a good job then!
Do not fear! We are devoted to our charge!
Wow! You must be really old!
No! I am not old! My family has guarded the staff for many generations.
Halt! You will not leave here with the Staff of Armadyl!
Have you killed Lucien?
Not yet, I've lost the pendant you gave me!
Hurry friend! Time is against us!
Not yet.
Have you got the Staff of Armadyl yet?
No, not yet.
Yes! Here it is.
Muhahahhahahaha!
I can feel the power of the staff running through me! I will be more powerful and they shall bow down to me!
I suppose you want your reward? I shall grant you much power!
You don't want to attack me. I am your friend.
You have defeated me for now! I shall reappear in the North!

characters.name: Fire Warrior of Lesarkus
characters.description: Adult male, deep intimidating voice, confrontational and protective tone, an ancient fire mage guardian who demands identification and attacks those claiming to be heroes.

characters.name: Guardian of Armadyl
characters.description: Adult, British accent, devoted and righteous tone, a holy warrior who has dedicated their life to protecting the Staff of Armadyl from evil.

characters.name: Lucien
characters.description: Ancient male Mahjarrat, sinister and manipulative voice, deceptively friendly tone that turns to megalomaniacal laughter, a powerful necromancer scheming to acquire godly artifacts.

characters.name: Winelda
characters.description: Adult female witch, cackling and quirky voice with Gollum-like speech patterns, a mystical spellcaster who demands limpwurt roots in exchange for her teleportation services.
